author: jade ward
comment: Needs updated. All of hour watches do. Weather shows 3 numbers like 574 making the face unusable since wear 2.0. Thts fine fine for free apps but not paid apps.

author: Linh Dang
comment: The weather on my watch is incorrect.. It shows 3 digit number.. Like 561, 563 etc.

author: Rick Medina
comment: Weather potion is all screwed up showing 3 digits like 566, 578 etc.

author: Aaron Carolipio
comment: No major battery drain (Huawei)  customizable colors.  Use this watch face 99% of the time.
title: Also a favorite

author: Brian Walker
comment: Beautiful with default colors and gives me the simple info I need.
title: This is my favorite watch face

author: Sean McShane
comment: Great watch face. I love the night faces. They look brill.
title: Loved it

author: Andrew Saylor
comment: I would like to see the 3 6 9 and 12 numbers disappear when you remove the watch analog hands. It would help to remove unneed clutter! Thanks!
title: Nice face with lots of customization.

author: adrian simental
comment: Good luck with your watch lasting you a whole day. Ambient mode is not available unless you want colors showing thus draining your battery quick. It has everything exept a simple AMBIENT mode yes BLACK/WHITE!!!
title: No simple ambient mode?!!

author: Olu Ola
comment: Works great on my Huawei watch and the preset color themes are awesome.

author: Evan Thomas
comment: Great, but eats up the battery

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Would you please give us your situation more in detail?
I'd like to improve.Please feel free to contact our email address.
Thank you.

author: kirk watstien
comment: Its great but you need to put a bigger pic up showing the face features its too small to read i bought but almost didnt be ause i just couldnt see the description pic showing features
title: Watch face

author: Darren Mitchell - Whiteside
comment: These are the very best faces you can get, i have 8 now and my collection will carry on growing. Fantastic app design worth every penny
title: Love them all

author: Gweeds
comment: Another superb design by smart watch bureau, lots of presets to choose from with the ability to then customise those just to your liking. Crisp clear graphics.
title: Awesome face
